about_the_game:
Trying to romance your love interest but falling short on your choice selections?
Interested in reading some choice-related dev commentary?

The Official Guide for the Synthetic Lover BL visual novel may be for you!

Featuring:

- All the MAIN choices listed + general recommendations
- Dev commentary on each
- 9-page easy-to-read PDF

Viewing instructions:

1. Right click Synthetic Lover (must be installed) in your Steam Library and select "Properties"
2. Under the "Local Files" tab, select “Browse...”
3. Open the "Synthetic Lover Official Choice Guide" sub-folder for the official PDF guide.
